arc_module_dash.name: Arc Module: Dash
arc_module_dash.desc: When Arc Suit is active, your dashes become Jet dashes allowing you to attack while dashing.

oath_arcwarder.name: Oath: Arcwarder
oath_arcwarder.desc: You vow to be a shield for your comrades, to wear your regalia with pride and serve the greater collective. From each according to their ability, to each according to their needs.

arc_module_eject.name: Arc Module: Eject
arc_module_eject.desc: When block broken with Arc Suit active, eject from the armor.

arc_module_null.name: Arc Module: Null
arc_module_null.desc: When your Arc suit is active, outgoing and incoming enchant effects are nullified.

arc_module_leap.name: Arc Module: Leap
arc_module_leap.desc: Holding Spacebar after double jumping propels you up for a short duration.

arc_module_guard.name: Arc Module: Guard
arc_module_guard.desc: Blocking with your Arc Suit active negates all backstabs and allows you to block attacks from behind.
